item.title: How to start with OpenFaaS
item.description: Introduction Before we get into what is serverless or openfaas, I would like to talk about the concept behind this. So, before going into the details, I want to give you the big picture of this new way of developing applications and how the users are supposed to use them. Containers are now more efficient than ever So letâ€™s go back in time, when computers were enormous things and filled complete rooms.
